name: GPF-Static Links - Verify Test the display and functionality of static links and associated URLs
Cart - Need Help Section Functionality- Verify that the Need Help section provides relevant information and functionalities.
My Account Order details - Write a Product Review - Verify 'Write a Product Review' button is shown only if the order status is marked 'Delivered'.
Cart - Display Remove CTA Functionality - Verify clicking on Remove btn, application removes the item from the Saved for Later section.

Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify Add card form shows following fields associated with credit card:- Card number- Expiry date (mm//yy)- Security code (? icon)- Save as default card checkbox- Save card button.
Account - Sign In (Drawer)/Sign In Page - Validate user should be able to login to site and close success message
Validate Move to cart and View More Details(if variants are present) in wishList page

PDP - Display of Additional Images as Thumbnails - Verify additional images associated with variants thumbnail images,variant has more than 5 image associated with it, system shall display left and right navigation arrows.
Verify Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping scenario - check progress bar and return to cart
PDP - Highlighting Selected Thumbnail Image - Verify that system can highlight with a black outline the thumbnail image that corresponds to the image currently being viewed as full sized.
Validate the display and functionality of products, including default product image, color variants, name, pricing, reviews, and add to cart CTA
Logged in: Placing order with saved credit card
Verify the 10 autocomplete suggestions for the search terms are displayed as selectable text links
PDP - Display of Selected Variant Image - Verify that selected variant’s image is displayed  as full sized to the left

Navigation to PDP from PLP - Verify that Clicking on product image, name, or link redirected to the PDP
